It contains: - Personal biographical data (birth date, place of birth, height, blood type, gender) - Individual photo - Signature - Fingerprint - Security elements (barcode, official registration) - Individual identification number - Issued by government identification authority 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** I confirm this document meets CECRL criteria with comprehensive personal identification details. The card provides official verification of Luis Alberto Vargas Veloza's identity through multiple unique identifiers and government-issued authentication methods. Security features and official validation strongly indicate a genuine national identification document from Colombia's government authority. The comprehensive personal data and distinctive security elements definitively classify this as a standard citizen identification card.
